author: bharath.vedartham
content:
hey lodestar devs, we notice that a lot of nodestar validators are not registered with the mev-relay. Validators in ranges:
1. 193-296
2. 657-696
3. 817-818
are not registered with the relay api. You can look into the validator ranges in: https://config.fusaka-devnet-3.ethpandaops.io/api/v1/nodes/validator-ranges
there are a few nimbus nodes here too. But majority seem to be lodestar

author: bharath.vedartham
content: cc: <@586161934425128960> <@785811170387951616> any ideas on why this could happen. i ll check if there is any issue with the relay but i m currently doubting

author: bharath.vedartham
content:
```
time="2025-07-28T05:45:12.323Z" level=info msg="http: POST /eth/v1/builder/validators 502" duration=0.051311 method=POST path=/eth/v1/builder/validators status=502 version=
```
looking at the mev-boost logs, i see a 502 error when calling register validators. I am checking if there is any issue with the relay

author: _shemnon
content:
As discussed on the testing call, here are eth_config PRs to EIP and execution-apis
- https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10067
- https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/678/
Three changes:
- remove the notion of a config hash, it will all be JSON diffs now
- invert the precompiles, key is now precompile name
- (not discussed on call) move the forkID into the config object, removing (current|next|last)ForkID from the top level and moving it into each respecive config.
